Put your assets here (you will upload them yourself):
- bg1.jpg ... bg5.jpg  (backgrounds)
- track1.mp3 ... track5.mp3 (music)
- sfx_win.mp3 , sfx_lose.mp3 (optional)
No other changes needed. The site will automatically:
- switch backgrounds with Switch Design
- generate Meme Mode bubble sprites from the CURRENT background image
